std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Isabella Smith"
Source: Baptisms 1810-1821 involving British people, extracted from the Cape Town Gazette. Note: These transcribed extracts are taken from C. Graham Botha, Collected Works Vol 3, Chapter 11. Transcribed by C. Graham Botha. Contributed by Liz Eshmade
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smith anywhere in the surname with isabella anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Isabella Smith baptism on 4 Jul 1819.
